Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Api Ib T1A3N7A8 (Apidaecin IB T1,A3,N7,A8 variant, Pro-rich, PrAMPs, synthetic AMPs, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: expression library screen, amino acid substitution, insects, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (77.78%) toApidaecin IBP: 33%, R: 17%, A=N: 11%.Activity: it inhibited E. coli BL21 (MIC 8-64 uM) in RPMI/serum or TSB and MIC>64 uM in LB. Activity in LB < RPMI < TSB. It appears that this Pro-rich peptide is more active in the TSB medium. Warning: Other bacteria not tested.
